author: smuzaffar
body:
Added dependency on rootgeom to resolve errors seen in UBSAN IBs.
```
  tmp/slc7_amd64_gcc700/src/DetectorDescription/DDCMS/src/DetectorDescriptionDDCMS/DDNamespace.cc.o:(.data.rel+0x98): undefined reference to `typeinfo for TGeoShape'
```
title: added rootgeom dependency to fix UBSAN IBs
